General.Name: OVB Holding AG
General.Description: OVB Holding AG, through its subsidiaries, provides advisory and brokerage services to private households in Europe. The company provides advisory services to clients in structuring their finances; and broking various financial products offered by insurance companies, banks, building societies, and other enterprises. OVB Holding AG was founded in 1970 and is based in Cologne, Germany.

0.Name: Mr. Mario  Freis
0.Title: Chairman of the Exec. Board & CEO
